name: The Grand Chateau of Brittany
description:
DESCRIPTION
The Grand Chateau and its extensive estate is the ideal place for weddings and other events.
The castle and its environment features 60 hectares of stunning parkland and extensive gardens, providing a unique setting for your celebration.
The château has been recently refurbished to make it a place of modern comfort, without compromising on authenticity and charm.
Experience an extraordinary banquet in its exceptional reception rooms or in the grounds, a ceremony in the gardens and dance the night away under the stars.
A place as comfortable as possible, we assure you of a happy marriage which will begin with an extraordinary banquet.
Located in southern Brittany, there is plenty for you and your guests to enjoy in the area including cycling, horse riding and hiking. It is also near several main towns meaning that it is very well connected. The beaches of Brittany are less than 60 km away.
The castle is one of the most noticeable architectural masterpieces of the region with its choices of materials and the finests designs. The historical elements of the castle have been kept in place, well preserved and restored with taste of the finest craftsmen, especially the parquet floors, woodwork, stone work, and the fireplaces.
Privatise the entire castle for your wedding:
You can host 60 guest for a seated dinner and 170 guests for a standing cocktail.
33 guests can sleep in the castle in the 18 bedrooms .
The swimming pool with its splendid views of the castle is ideal for cocktail receptions or a poolside brunch the day after the wedding.
SPACES & CAPACITIES
A sumptuous dining room with its waxed wood panelling, a unique veranda, and two lounges including a games room with billiards are available. You can rent the castle's reception rooms exclusively for a capacity of 170 people or 60 seated people. If you wish to invite more than 60 seated people, the team can organise buffets or cocktails in the castle and you can have a tent set up in front of the castle to admire its architecture throughout the evening.
The Château offers you the opportunity to rent its romantic space and provides you, without any obligation, with a list of service providers that will meet all your requirements. Among other things, it will be able to provide you with a caterer, a florist, an orchestra, music, entertainment and much more.
In addition, there is also a quaint and unique chapel in the grounds which is available for you to use for your ceremony or as a backdrop for photos. What's more, the chateau's forest also features ancient monoliths, which are fascinating to see!
ACCOMMODATION
With uniquely decorated bedrooms, there is plenty of accommodation for your guests to stay onsite:
1 x single room
4 x double room
5 x queen room
5 x twin/double room
6 x super king room
For more information please do get in touch and we will be more than happy to send you a bespoke quotate. We look forward to hearing from you.
additional_info:
FEATURES
Golf course nearby
Internet access
Baby friendly (cots, changing facilities)
Swimming pool
Hotel recommendation list
Chapel on site
Recommended wedding planner
Recommended suppliers list available
Recommended caterer
Nearest Airport
